This script analyzes temperature measurements during resazurin assays conducted at VIMS.     

# Set up 

Set up workspace, set options, and load required packages.    
```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

Load libraries. 
```{r}
library(MASS) 
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(cowplot)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(car)
library(effects)
library(emmeans)
library(tools)
```

# Load data 

```{r}
temps<-read_excel(path="data/temperature.xlsx")
```

# Plot data 

```{r}
temps%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=timepoint, y=temperature))+
  facet_wrap(~date)+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line()+
  theme_classic()
```
